If you're looking for a movie that explores themes of revenge and guilt, "The Revenant" might be your cup of tea. The brutal portrayal of the protagonist and his fight for survival will leave you both horrified and strangely sympathetic. 

If you're more interested in a psychological thriller with a chilling twist, "Untraceable" would be a perfect fit. The relentless pursuit of a serial killer by FBI agent Marsh will keep you on the edge of your seat.

For a more comedic and darkly humorous take on revenge, "Hannibal Rising" is a treat. The unsettling story of a young man seeking revenge on his massacring family will leave you with a lingering sense of unease.
